attributes.action: Not to leave EU despite referendum. As it will end the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned implore the incoming prime minister not to end the United Kingdom. For the sake of a few Eurosceptics
attributes.background: The people of England and Wales have voted by a slim margin to leave the EU. To continue with actually leaving goes against the votes of our fellow British citizens in Scotland and Northern Ireland. To commit to leaving will tear our United Kingdom  apart.
